title: Customer allegedly throws straws at LiHo staff in Hougang Mall outlet, police report made
desc: A police report has been made after a customer allegedly threw straws at the staff of a LiHo outlet in Hougang Mall.

title: Fire guts Agatex Paint Factory in Ho
desc: A major fire outbreak that swept through the Agatex Paint Factory in Ho has been brought under control, the Ghana National Fire Service (GNFS) has confirmed.

title: Miyetti Allah denies terror links in US accountability bill
desc: Miyetti Allah refutes allegations of terrorism linked to a US bill, urging Nigerian government intervention to prevent sanctions and protect its reputation

title: He spent decades perfecting his voice. Now he says Google stole it.
desc: NPR’s David Greene says he was “completely freaked out” when he heard an AI voice that sounded just like his own, and he’s suing over it.

title: Take part in a fan Q&A with Italy's alpine skiing legend Kristian Ghedina at the Winter Olympics Milano Cortina 2026
desc: Olympics.com will host Kristian Ghedina (Italy) for a digital meet-and-greet, with an opportunity to ask questions and win a one-on-one virtual meeting with Guseli

title: Samajwadi Party leader killed as high mast pole falls on moving car in UP
desc: The Samajwadi Party leader was barely 500 metres from his home when a high mast pole collapsed onto his moving car.

title: Nancy Guthrie latest: Task force awaits forensic results as search enters third week
desc: Nancy Guthrie went missing two weeks ago after being kidnapped from her home in Tucson, Arizona. Authorities have yet to publicly name any suspects or persons of interest.

title: Secretlab Named Official Chair & Desk Partner of PGL Cluj
desc: Secretlab’s chairs and desk take center stage at PGL’s Counter-Strike 2 competition.

title: ‘The ride was worth the fall’: Lindsey Vonn returning to US for further surgeries after downhill crash
desc: Lindsey Vonn is preparing to fly back to America after she fractured her tibia last week, according to the CEO of the US Ski and Snowboard Association

title: energy minister arrested while attempting to leave country
desc: His detention comes as he faces legal proceedings after being dismissed in a corruption scandal.
